title: Warmonger Rek'Sai
body: Its been a while since {{champion:421}} was released and ive been a big fan. And i think that a new skin should be released, my idea is warmonger Rek'Sai imagine Rek'Sai underground with bones protruding from her back and for claws she could have some kind of bone claws.

replies.body: wont work china doesnt like bones viewable in games

> [{quoted}](name=vargo,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=L9odaEnt,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-05-18T22:54:31.078+0000)
>
> wont work china doesnt like bones viewable in games

You mean like the ones clearly visible in the Jurassic skin line?
